ip access-list extended AllowWebBlockOthers
	permit tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 172.27.8.55 0.0.0.0 eq 80
	permit tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 172.27.8.55 0.0.0.0 eq 443
	deny ip 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 172.27.8.55 0.0.0.0	
	deny tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 172.27.8.53 0.0.0.0	
	deny tcp 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 172.27.8.54 0.0.0.0
	permit ip 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255 0.0.0.0 255.255.255.255
